title: Dr. Oz - TV Personality Running Medicare/Medicaid
summary: Trump appointed TV personality Dr. Oz with no government experience to oversee Medicare/Medicaid for 160+ million Americans. British Medical Journal study found 50% of his TV health advice was not supported or refuted by science. Up to $56 million in conflicts of interest.
keyFacts: TV personality with no experience running government agencies or healthcare programs
Oversees Medicare, Medicaid, CHIP, ACA marketplace for 160+ million Americans
2014 British Medical Journal study: 50% of his TV health advice was not supported or refuted by scientific evidence
AMA Journal of Ethics: 'A dangerous rogue unfit for the office of America's doctor'
150 Pennsylvania physicians called him a 'major threat to public health'
Up to $56 million invested in companies with direct CMS interests - massive conflict
Co-founded health benefits company ZorroRX that could profit from CMS decisions
Class action lawsuit settlement for false advertising of weight-loss products
Refused to commit to opposing Medicaid cuts under oath
